description: Upward Mobility's Microsoft .NET Framework flashcard app  for Palm webOS is perfect for the aspiring Microsoft Certified Technology Specialist or (MCTS) or Certified Professional Developer (MCPD), or the casual or rusty .NET framework developer.  It provides 268 essential .NET framework terms and concepts in an easy-to-use interface.  || The flashcards covers essential vocabulary and concepts related to all aspects of the.NET framework, including: developing applications, implementing service processes, security configuration, management, and installation.  ||  Upward Mobility creates high quality management education and test preparation material that is witty, engaging, and adds value in the learning process.  *   We are a double bottom line company committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries.
